Hypothermia.Elite 1: After Last Rite consumes any Arts Infliction, she applies Cryo Susceptibility to the target with the effect of [Number of Arts Infliction stacks consumed × 2%] for 15s. This effect cannot stack.
Hypothermia.Elite 2: After Last Rite consumes any Arts Infliction, she applies Cryo Susceptibility to the target with the effect of [Number of Arts Infliction stacks consumed × 4%] for 15s. This effect cannot stack.

Cryogenic Embrittlement.Elite 2: Ultimate Vigil Services improved: When the ultimate deals DMG to an enemy with Cryo Susceptibility, the effect of that Cryo Susceptibility is 1.2 times the original.
Cryogenic Embrittlement.Elite 3: Ultimate Vigil Services improved: When the ultimate deals DMG to an enemy with Cryo Susceptibility, the effect of that Cryo Susceptibility is 1.5 times the original.

Cemetery Gardening.Elite 1: Assign to Growth Chamber to grant vitrified plant growth rate +20%
Cemetery Gardening.Elite 3: Assign to Growth Chamber to grant vitrified plant growth rate +30%

Fame of the Royal Courts.Elite 2: Assign to Reception Room to grant operators a small Clue 7 Rate-UP: Seš'qa (activates upon assignment; effects of the same type cannot stack)
Fame of the Royal Courts.Elite 4: Assign to Reception Room to grant operators Clue 7 Rate-UP: Seš'qa (activates upon assignment; effects of the same type cannot stack)
